content: So <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style> is a secret furniture fundi! That's amazing! You've already gotten all three pieces of furniture? Let me see... it was a <style=Highlight>potted plant</style>, a <style=Highlight>Coolbreeze AC</style>, and an <style=Highlight>Azure Firefly Sofa</style>.

content: {A虎啸}<style=SizeBig>Hiss!</style> Perfect, now the room's all nice and cool! Thank you, kula bata!

content: {A点头}Looks like things are trickier than I initially thought. Don't worry, there's no rush. I'm looking around to see where we can get some ice to help cool down in the meantime...

content: {A歪头}Looks like we're still missing some things...? Furniture can be quite troublesome, but I'm glad I have you here. No rush though! Take your time, I'll wait.
